name: Dodge The Box (José Martins)
description:
Dodge as many boxes as you can and get the highest score possible

Are you up to the challenge? Try to dodge for as long as you can.

Features
  • Concentrating music.
  • Mobile and PC input.
  • Simple gameplay.
  • Low-Poly environment.
Controls
  • A / Screen touch left to move to the left.
  • D / Screen touch right to move to the right.
  • R to restart game.
  • ESC to pause the game.
Credits Music
  • https://gooseninja.itch.io/minimalistc-loops
  • https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music
